#########################
## Limited by deposits ##
#########################

building_mote_harvesters = {
	base_buildtime = @b2_time
	# This is tricky, but works
	is_capped_by_modifier = yes
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature
	
	category = resource

	#prerequisites = {
	#	"tech_mine_volatile_motes"
	#}
	
	potential = {
		always = no
		# These are now other buildings because the fix of max building autogenerated modifiers
		NOR = {
			has_modifier = resort_colony
			has_modifier = crucible_colony
		}
		tec_adds_motes_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		#check_modifier_value = {
		#	modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
		#	value < 1
		#}
		always = yes
	}

	convert_to = {
		building_tec_mote_harvesters
	}
	
	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			energy = @b3_upkeep
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			energy = @b3_minus_upkeep
			food = @b3_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_chemists_volatile_motes_produces_add = 1
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			# Planet deposits add 1 job
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = { # ai bait
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_building = building_mote_harvesters
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 10
		}
	}
}

building_gas_extractors = {
	base_buildtime = @b1_time
	# This is tricky, but works
	is_capped_by_modifier = yes
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature

	category = resource

	#prerequisites = {
	#	"tech_mine_exotic_gases"
	#}
	
	potential = {
		always = no
		# These are now other buildings because the fix of max building autogenerated modifiers
		NOR = {
			has_modifier = resort_colony
			has_modifier = crucible_colony
		}
		tec_adds_gases_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		#check_modifier_value = {
		#	modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
		#	value < 1
		#}
		always = yes
	}

	convert_to = {
		building_tec_gas_extractors
	}
	
	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			energy = @b3_upkeep
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			energy = @b3_minus_upkeep
			food = @b3_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_refiners_exotic_gases_produces_add = 1
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			# Planet deposits add 1 job
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = { # ai bait
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_building = building_tec_gas_extractors
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 10
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 10
		}
	}
}

building_crystal_mines = {
	base_buildtime = @b1_time
	# This is tricky, but works
	is_capped_by_modifier = yes
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature

	category = resource

	#prerequisites = {
	#	"tech_mine_rare_crystals"
	#}
	
	potential = {
		always = no
		# These are now other buildings because the fix of max building autogenerated modifiers
		NOR = {
			has_modifier = resort_colony
			has_modifier = crucible_colony
		}
		tec_adds_crystals_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		#check_modifier_value = {
		#	modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
		#	value < 1
		#}
		always = yes
	}

	convert_to = {
		building_tec_crystal_mines
	}

	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			energy = @b3_upkeep
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			energy = @b3_minus_upkeep
			food = @b3_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_translucers_rare_crystals_produces_add = 1
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			# Planet deposits add 1 job
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = { # ai bait
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_building = building_tec_crystal_mines
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 10
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 10
		}
	}
}

building_betharian_power_plant = {
	base_buildtime = @b1_time
	# This is tricky, but works
	is_capped_by_modifier = yes
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature

	category = resource

	#prerequisites = {
	#	"tech_mine_betharian"
	#}

	potential = {
		always = no
		# These are now other buildings because the fix of max building autogenerated modifiers
		NOR = {
			has_modifier = resort_colony
			has_modifier = crucible_colony
		}
		tec_has_betharian_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		#check_modifier_value = {
		#	modifier = building_betharian_power_plant_max
		#	value < 1
		#}
		always = yes
	}

	convert_to = {
		building_tec_betharian_power_plant
	}
	
	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			food = @b1_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		produces = {
			energy = 30
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_technician_energy_produces_add = 2
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_regular_empire = yes }
		}
		modifier = {
			job_technician_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
		}
		modifier = {
			job_technician_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_desc = {
		trigger = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
		}
		text = job_technician_drone_effect_desc
	}
	triggered_desc = {
		trigger = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = no }
		}
		text = job_technician_effect_desc
	}


}

building_xeno_zoo = {
	base_buildtime = @b1_time
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature
	is_capped_by_modifier = yes

	category = resource

	potential = {
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			is_regular_empire = yes
		}
		check_modifier_value = {
			modifier = building_xeno_zoo_max
			value >=1
		}
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_regular_empire = no
				}
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_xeno_zoo_max
				value < 1
			}
		}
	}

	planet_modifier = {
		job_entertainer_add = 1
		job_culture_worker_add = 2
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				has_valid_civic = civic_warrior_culture
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_duelist_add = 1
			job_entertainer_add = -1
		}
	}

	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = 200
		}
		upkeep = {
			energy = 1
		}
	}

	prerequisites = {
		"tech_alien_life_studies"
	}

	triggered_desc = {
		trigger = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_warrior_culture }
		}
		text = job_duelist_effect_desc
	}

	triggered_desc = {
		trigger = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { NOT = { has_valid_civic = civic_warrior_culture } }
		}
		text = job_entertainer_effect_desc
	}

	triggered_desc = {
		text = job_culture_worker_effect_desc
	}
}

# ------- Evolved mimics
# These are created as the previous bug with autogenerated building_max modifiers is fixed
# They are planet unique
building_tec_mote_harvesters = {
	icon = building_mote_harvesters
	base_buildtime = @b2_time
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature
	
	category = resource

	prerequisites = {
		"tech_mine_volatile_motes"
	}
	
	potential = {
		NOR = {
			has_modifier = resort_colony
			has_modifier = crucible_colony
		}
		tec_adds_motes_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		OR = {
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value < 1
			}
			OR = {
				has_modifier = resort_colony
				has_modifier = crucible_colony
			}
		}
	}
	
	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			energy = @b3_upkeep
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			energy = @b3_minus_upkeep
			food = @b3_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_chemists_volatile_motes_produces_add = 1
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			# Planet deposits add 1 job
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_mote_harvesters_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvesting_drone_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = { # ai bait
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_building = building_mote_harvesters
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_mote_harvester_add = 10
		}
	}
}

building_tec_gas_extractors = {
	icon = building_gas_extractors
	base_buildtime = @b1_time
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature

	category = resource

	prerequisites = {
		"tech_mine_exotic_gases"
	}
	
	potential = {
		NOR = {
			has_modifier = resort_colony
			has_modifier = crucible_colony
		}
		tec_adds_gases_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		OR = {
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value < 1
			}
			OR = {
				has_modifier = resort_colony
				has_modifier = crucible_colony
			}
		}
	}
	
	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			energy = @b3_upkeep
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			energy = @b3_minus_upkeep
			food = @b3_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_refiners_exotic_gases_produces_add = 1
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			# Planet deposits add 1 job
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_gas_extractors_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = { # ai bait
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_building = building_tec_gas_extractors
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_gas_extractor_add = 10
			job_gas_extraction_drone_add = 10
		}
	}
}

building_tec_crystal_mines = {
	icon = building_crystal_mines
	base_buildtime = @b1_time
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature

	category = resource

	prerequisites = {
		"tech_mine_rare_crystals"
	}
	
	potential = {
		NOR = {
			has_modifier = resort_colony
			has_modifier = crucible_colony
		}
		tec_adds_crystals_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		OR = {
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value < 1
			}
			OR = {
				has_modifier = resort_colony
				has_modifier = crucible_colony
			}
		}
	}

	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			energy = @b3_upkeep
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			energy = @b3_minus_upkeep
			food = @b3_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_translucers_rare_crystals_produces_add = 1
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			# Planet deposits add 1 job
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_regular_empire = yes 
			}
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 1
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 1
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 2
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 3
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 5
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_crystal_mines_max
				value >= 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 6
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = { # ai bait
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_building = building_tec_crystal_mines
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			job_crystal_miner_add = 10
			job_crystal_mining_drone_add = 10
		}
	}
}

building_tec_betharian_power_plant = {
	icon = building_betharian_power_plant
	base_buildtime = @b1_time
	base_cap_amount = 1
	position_priority = 40		# Planet Feature

	category = resource

	prerequisites = {
		"tech_mine_betharian"
	}

	potential = {
		NOT = { has_modifier = resort_colony }
		tec_has_betharian_deposit = yes
	}

	destroy_trigger = {
		OR = {
			check_modifier_value = {
				modifier = building_betharian_power_plant_max
				value < 1
			}
			OR = {
				has_modifier = resort_colony
				has_modifier = crucible_colony
			}
		}
	}
	
	resources = {
		category = planet_buildings
		cost = {
			minerals = @b3_minerals
		}
		# Special resource civics
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			food = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		upkeep = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { tec_is_bioarch_empire = yes }
			}
			food = @b1_half_upkeep
		}
		cost = {
			trigger = {
				owner = { has_valid_civic = civic_tec_machine_digitalization }
			}
			minerals = @b3_minus_minerals
			energy = @b3_half_minerals
		}
		produces = {
			energy = 30
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		planet_technician_energy_produces_add = 2
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_regular_empire = yes }
		}
		modifier = {
			job_technician_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_planet_modifier = {
		potential = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
		}
		modifier = {
			job_technician_drone_add = 4
		}
	}

	triggered_desc = {
		trigger = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = yes }
		}
		text = job_technician_drone_effect_desc
	}
	triggered_desc = {
		trigger = {
			exists = owner
			owner = { is_gestalt = no }
		}
		text = job_technician_effect_desc
	}


}

#building_tec_deposit_moistfarm

#building_tec_deposit_tritium

#building_tec_deposit_icecrystals

#building_tec_deposit_heatfarm

#building_tec_deposit_coremining

#building_tec_deposit_gravity

#building_tec_deposit_rare
